pageContext.claim: “We had one [poll] with ABC, I think it was ABC Washington Post just before the election, like a week before we're down 12.”
pageContext.analysis: ABC-Washington Post started the tracking poll and found Clinton up 12 on waves ending Oct. 22 and Oct 23, which was just over two weeks before election day. On Nov. 1, one week from election day, the poll had Clinton 47-Trump 45, same as Clinton's final two point margin in the popular vote. The final poll had Clinton 47 and Trump 43, which was not statistically significant.
